CVXPY
Minimize
  n
Subject To
 6: 1.0 <= n
Bounds
 n free
Generals
 n
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: +1 x_0
Subject to
 c1: -1 x_0 <= -1
Bounds
 x_0 free
Generals
 x_0
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Minimize
 Obj: +1 n
Subject to
 6: +1 n >= +1
Bounds
 n free
Generals
 n
End
